greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of coefficients of (1 - x)^n*B(x/(1 - x),n), where B(x,n) is the Morgan-Voyce polynomial related to A078812.
comment: The n-th row consists of the coefficients in the expansion of Sum_{j=0..n} A078812(n,j)*x^j*(1 - x)^(n - j).
link: Thomas Koshy, Morgan-Voyce Polynomials, Fibonacci and Lucas Numbers with Applications, John Wiley & Sons, 2001, pp. 480-495.
M. N. S. Swamy, Rising Diagonal Polynomials Associated with Morgan-Voyce Polynomials, The Fibonacci Quarterly Vol. 38 (2000), 61-70.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Morgan-Voyce Polynomials
formula: Row n = coefficients in the expansion of (1/sqrt((4 - 3*x)*x))*(((2 - x + sqrt((4 - 3*x)*x))/2)^(n + 1) - ((2 - x - sqrt((4 - 3*x)*x))/2)^(n + 1)).
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n + k + 1, n - k];
Table[CoefficientList[Sum[t[n, k]*x^k*(1 - x)^(n - k), {k, 0, n}], x], {n, 0, 10}]//Flatten
program: (Maxima) t(n, k) := binomial(n + k + 1, n - k)$
P(x, n) := expand(sum(t(n, j)*x^j*(1 - x)^(n - j), j, 0, n))$
T(n, k) := ratcoef(P(x, n), x, k)$
tabf(nn) := for n:0 thru nn do print(makelist(T(n, k), k, 0, hipow(P(x, n), x)))$ /* _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 09 2018 */
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 24 2006
ext: Edited, new name, and offset corrected by _Franck Maminirina Ramaharo_, Oct 09 2018
